title: Classic Ferrari serial number plates
content:
I have been asked to re-create these three metal serial number plates to be used on a restored classic Ferrari.  
Hopefully the good people of the forum can help me with a few pointers as to the fonts used.

I'm counting 7 different fonts being used - not including the old style Ferrari logo typography (a vector of which is also proving difficult at the moment)

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |

comments.content:
|motore contiene| is Eurostile:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/")

|SHELL SUPER MOTOR OIL| could be replicated using Tablet Gothic (substitute a lowercase |l| for the |I|):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/tablet-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/tablet-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/tablet-gothic/")

The center panel appears to be a mix of Univers (numbers) and Helvetica (letters):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/")

|FERRARI 365 GTB/4-A| appears to be News Gothic Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/news-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/news-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/news-gothic/")

|MOTORE ENGINE|, |AUTOTELAIO CHASSIS|, and |MADE IN ITALY| appear to be Futura:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/")

|365 GTB/4-A| appears to be Reforma:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/reforma-grotesk-bold-e/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/reforma-grotesk-bold-e/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/reforma-grotesk-bold-e/")

Perhaps a better option for |SHELL SUPER MOTOR OIL|—Trivia Gothic Condensed:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/trivia-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/trivia-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/trivia-gothic/")

\_SHELL SUPER MOTOR OIL\_ Good find Kevin! Much closer than Tablet, where \_O\_ was too square etc. For a perfect match very minor tinkering with the bowls on \_P\_ and \_R\_ to make them less squared and have the leg of \_R\_ join the bowl closer to the vertical stroke,  
Don

\_SHELL SUPER MOTOR OIL\_ Also edit \_S\_: clip terminals and thin diagonal. Bold weight is better match than regular.  
don
